verbose_text: As shown in XREF_FIG b, impact savings in absolute values mainly occur in the Northern provinces of Modena and Milano for avoided GHGs amounts of ~ 0.7 Mt CO 2 e (XREF_FIG b), followed by other provinces located in the regions of Lombardia (i.e. Bergamo and Brescia) and Emilia-Romagna (i.e. Ferrara).
